xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 8 Tika, Saraṇaduka » 8.8 Dassanattika, Saraṇaduka » 8.8.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Tika, Saraṇaduka
Dassanattika, Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
31.
1791Dassanena pahātabbaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1792Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1793Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1794(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
32.
1795Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1796Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1797(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
